title: FS: 19th century baseball trade cards, set of 5 (SOLD)
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: FS: 19th century baseball trade cards, set of 5 (SOLD)
posts.post_content:
These images originally were used to advertise Merchant's Gargling Oil in the 1870s, but they were subsequently used as stock cards to advertise a wide variety of products. This particular set of 5 cards has no advertising and blank backs, but nice images. They're yours for $55 shipped. (SOLD)
